title: Access to the future
creator_credit: Chris O'Rourke and Mornington School Support Centre
brief_description: Teacher librarians in primary schools face a varied demand on services and resources. This program demonstrates the basic approaches in establishing both policy and resources. Aspects of catalogues and cooperative curriculum planning are discussed, drawing upon practical experiences of some Victorian schools. Suitable for school councils and parent presentations.
